titleStmt.title: SII 12.187: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 187. (A.R. No. 60 of 1932-33). TIRUKKACHCHIYŪR, CHINGLEPUT TALUK AND DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE FIRST PRĀKĀRA IN THE KACHCHAPĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription, dated in the 14th year, refers to a sale of 195 kuḻi of land called ‘Marundan-tirunandavanam’ to the ūravar, for 7,500 kāśu, made in the 26th year of Rājarāja III by Īśāṉadēva, the manager, and the trustees of the temple of Tiruvālakkōyiluḍaiya-Nāyaṉār at Tirukkachchūr in Śeṅkuṉṟa-nāḍu, a subdivision of Kaḷattūrkōṭṭam, a district of Ja[ya*]ṅgoṇḍaśōḻa-maṇḍalam. Māṅguḍaiyāṉ Tiruvaiyāṟuḍaiyāṉ Tirumuttīśuramuḍaiyāṉ Amarabuyaṅkarapperumāḷ, an āṇḍār and a later manager of this temple in the time of Peruñjiṅgadēva paid back the amount and acquired the 195 kuḻi to provide a flower-garden for the god.
The astronomical details given in the record correspond to A.D. 1256, August 10, Thursday.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiruvāykkeḻavimuṉṉākac cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkopperuñciṅkate
vaṟkku yāṇṭu 10 4vatu ciṅkanāyaṟṟu Amarapakṣattu Uttiraṭṭātiyum viyāḻakkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa nāḷ
jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kaḷattūrkkoṭṭattuc ceṅkuṉṟanāṭṭut tirukkaccūr Uṭaiyā
r tiruvālakkoyiluṭaiya nāyaṉāṟku Iṉṉāyaṉār koyil keṭkiṟa Āṇṭār māṅkuṭai
yāṉ tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyāṉ tirumutticuramuṭaiyāṉ Amarapuyaṅkarapperumāḷ . Irājarā
jade vaṟku 26vatu nāḷil Ikkoyil keṭṭa Īcāṉatevarun tāṉattārumākac cikāriyap peṟṟukku
m māṟkamāṭaikkumāka Ivvūri lūravaril noccikkiḻāṉ teṉṉavaṉ viḻupparaiyaṉukkum kirantai Aru
ṇināyakaṉukkum noccikkiḻāṉcelvaṉ tevāṇṭaikkum niyā[yaThe letter ya is engraved below the line.]ttāril murukappiḷḷaik kum Āticaṇṭe
cura vilaiyāka viṟṟa maruntaṉ tirunantavaṉam patiṉaṟucāṇkolāl paḻampaṭi kuḻi
100 9 10 5 Ikkuḻi nūṟṟuttoṇṇūṟṟaiñcum Ivarkaḷ vilaikoṇṭuṭai
ya putukkācu 7 1000 5 100 Ikkācu Eḻāyirattaiññūṟum māṅkuṭaiyāṉ
tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyāṉ tirumutticuramuṭaiyāṉ Amar(ā)puyaṅkarapperumā
ḷeṉ Ivarkaḷukku kuṭuttu Ivarkaḷ vilaippiramāṇam vāṅki Iṉṉāyaṉā
rkku cantirātittavarai tirunantavaṉamāka maruntaṉ tirunantavaṉam tiruppaḷḷittāma
mākka cāttakkaṭavatāka cilālekai paṇṇik kuṭutteṉ Itu śrīmā heśvara ra kṣai .
Digital edition of SII 12.187 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
